name: Midnight Ghost Ride (fun but not free!)
name_original: Midnight Ghost Ride (fun but not free!)
description:
Made during the Global StartupCities Gamejam

All custom art, music and voice-acting!

(all music made in the last half our before the deadline)

A lonely ghost and a unlucky businessman find each other and come up with a plan to fix both their lives.

Controls:

Arrow  keys

Space

Explanation

Earn points by creating the scariest ghost ride! 

Place scary items to increase the Tension Level - Enable and Disable placed items during the ride to control the tension level 

Once the Tension Level is green, enable a Jumpscare item to get a Big Scare 

Try not to overload the tension level, otherwise it'll be too much for the visitors.

Use Cute and Cozy items to decrease the Tension Level 

Earn points with Big Scares to unlock new items
